alert.note: Alert for Northern Will; Southern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 05 at 6:16AM CDT until April 05 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Southern Cook and Northern Will Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures at or below freezing in some areas may result in the development of icy spots on untreated roads. Early morning motorists are urged to drive with caution as visibilities will vary significantly given the patchy nature of the freezing fog, along with the potential for slick spots on roads.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
